meanings.sent1: She kept miscounting the number of cookies in the jar.
meanings.sent2: He realized he was miscounting the money in his wallet.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous elf was miscounting the stars in the sky for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was miscounting the seconds, making time feel slower.
meanings.sent5: Miscounting the steps on the staircase, she stumbled and laughed.

meanings.sent1: The miscounting of votes led to confusion in the election results.
meanings.sent2: He discovered the miscounting in the inventory report.
meanings.sent3: The miscounting of sheep made the bedtime story amusing.
meanings.sent4: The miscounting of footsteps echoed through the empty hallway.
meanings.sent5: The miscounting of puzzle pieces made it challenging to complete the picture.
